verbose_text: Concerning molecular diagnosis, it has been shown that activating mutations in the MAPK pathway leading to nuclear factor kappa beta (NFkappabeta) overactivation inhibits the Janus kinase (JAK)/STAT pathway 11, 19, in what was classically considered " rasopathies.
